Met expectations stylish fit
My son loves his jeans said they were comfortable and fit perfectly.  The quality was great and for me the price (value ) was right
These slim-fit, ripped skinny jeans are not only stylish but also incredibly comfortable. The stretch denim allows for easy movement, making them perfect for everyday wear.

Jeans have a bad smell. Will need to wash them before wearing. Wanted to send back but son likes them.

评论概述: Fashionable But Expensive for the Quality
评论详情: These pants are quite fashionable and fit well. I got them in X-large larger considering I do not like a skinny fit. I'm 5'10' 170lbs and the XL size fits me well and remains loose in the legs. These jeans are very comfortable and I like the look quiet a bit. My main complaint is the cost. $44.99 is quite a bit for a pair of jeans. And while these fit well and look nice the fabric itself is very thing compared to regular jeans. So you're paying more for fashion than you are quality/durability. As of 10/4/23 there is an additional 20% off coupon available making these closer to $35 dollars so that helps. But really I think this should just be priced at most around $29.99 considering I can buy jeans just as thin as this at Wal**** for only $19.99. Overall I can recommend these but it's going to be up to the  individual if the price is worth paying.
These are comfortable and fit well. The style is new for me, but I really like it. They are also made well and look very nice on.
Love the color and material, a little long but fits perfect. Size runs a little small, im a large so i ordered XL and it fits great..
I like the fit and cut of these. They are very comfortable and stretch without being too soft and stretchy. The length is perfect and the buttons are cut well. A great buy.
Good stretch for great fit! Makes them very comfortable. Great quality

Very cool fashion pants, with great color and ripped/stacked design.  Has quite a bit of stretch to the fabric and has that slim look to it.  Really love the light blue acid washed look.  Very comfortable, material feels durable and the stitching is well done.
Very nice quality jeans Fit to size nice design
Good quality and true to size.

For the waist size given, these pants were just a little too snug. To have to order a full 2 inches waist size above the norm, to get a roomier pant leg, isn't something you can trust ordering online, without a proper fitting.
Fits great, looks nice & quality is decent

Well made and designed jeans however, they are not US sizes, I order a XL at 6'5' and the jeans are pretty much high rise and the waist is like a 36 and im more of a 32/33. These jeans are meant for people of shorter stature not tall guys like myself.

These fit really well, I went with the small and am normally a 32 waist size. Wish they were a tad bit longer, but I normally wear high tops so not a big issue. I'm really glad there aren't big pre bought holes because the frayed look sticks out on its own and looks pretty gnarly. I definitely recommend these

评论概述: NICE RIPPED JEANS, BUT NOT VERY SLIM FIT, MORE LIKE RELAXED BOOT CUT
评论详情: My husband thought he'd give these jeans a shot because they're interesting and different. And they aren't bad. They are a little different than the pictures in that they don't have a lot of the organic hanging ripped threads coming down, which actually didn't bother him much cause it could look a little messy. The ones we received are a little more "manicured". The main issue with him is that the jeans are NOT a slim fit, but more like a relaxed boot cut, so he would have to wear them differently than he first imagined. But overall, they are nice if that fit and relaxed style is what you're looking for.
These jeans are so nice and really comfortable! They are stretchy so you can move around easily and comfortably. They look just like the photo and fit exactly as they should, Very happy with these!

These look and fit great on my 13 y/o. He usually wears a men size small and these are great. Love the modern ripped look while still good enough for school. The waist is able to tighten from the inside in they are a little loose.

Hubby absolutely hated these pants. He says the stitching looks like a bunch of E’s going down the pants. I can’t help but agree. I think maybe they need to be washed to be distressed a little more and then possibly they’ll look better. I opted for a medium and they are too short for hubby, he’s tall and skinny. I’ll style them for myself but they are a little bit big in the waist for me. It was hard picking a size as men’s jeans usually go by waist inches x inseam inches and not S, M, or L.

My son loves these pants. It's the style now adays and they fit him really good. The tears in them look really cool and there nice and durable. Don't fit super tight and they got some stretch in them. I would definatly get them again for him.

I got these jeans for my oldest son who is 6ft so the length is great fit taller people. The design is a bit. It looks similar to the picture but not as defined. It could be that it is flat from shipping but it seems the fabric of the frayed detail isn't as thick as shown. He still likes them but as the picture shows they don't quite hit the mark on living up to the picture shown.

评论概述: Cool pair of unusual jeans, decent quality
评论详情: I got the x-large, I have a 36" waist, and they fit great! They are a lightweight canvas/denim with some stretch to them. The designer features kind of blend into the pants in the black color I selected, which is good for me as I wanted the texture without it screaming "I'm wearing unusual pants!" Instead, it's more of an audible look at me, which is a bit more subtle. Pockets are of an ok depth, but you get this for the style.

These jeans really don't look as good as the pictures.  They seem to be really cheaply made, low quality and not at all comfortable. The distressing on them are sewn on patches that look tacky as heck. Since they are sewn on, I don't have faith that they will stay on after several wash cycles.  The sizing is also weird since they are Asian sizes, which was warned about on the product page. But still definitely not for an American audience.
Unfortunately these jeans were a bit too big and hangs off my hips but a belt fixes that problem. The rips are awesome and let's a breeze in making them good for spring and fall.

评论概述: These babies really boost my self esteem, i have one for every day ending in "Y"
评论详情: As I walked by my wife while I was wearing these jeans, she let out a whistle and gave me a wink. SHE DEMANDS I NEVER TAKE THEM OFF (DURING THE DAY) SO IN ORDER TO SMELL THE WAY I LOOK I GOT 7 PAIRS.  That's right.  I know I look good.  I wear well made, sexy jeans, and  I wear them well.  I bet you do too.  Get you a pair today.

Distress patches are sewn on, which is kind of fun - and means there aren't holes in the jeans like some of the distressed products we have been seeing. These are a bit overdone, but are fun to wear, and fit well. They don't run small. Not sure yet if they will shrink - I don't think I will put them in the dryer given how the distress patches are put on. Hang dry is my recommendation. 4 stars.
